title: Remove user accounts, add homepage/social customization, redesign shop navigation

requirements.text: Remove the entire user account system for regular customers: delete ProfileSetupModal component, remove profile-related hooks (useUserProfile), remove account/order history pages for non-admin users, and remove all profile/account UI from the frontend that was intended for regular customers

quotes: Yes, specifically the privacy section part talking about internet Identity but if it effects more legal, update whatever is needed to be changed

acceptanceCriteria: ProfileSetupModal component is deleted
useUserProfile hook is removed or restricted to admin-only use
Account page and order history page are removed for non-admin users
No profile setup prompts appear for regular customers
Customers can only checkout as guests through Stripe

requirements.text: Implement first-user-becomes-admin authentication: modify backend to automatically grant admin privileges to the first user who logs in with Internet Identity, and ensure subsequent users do not receive admin access

quotes: We can make it the first user

acceptanceCriteria: First Internet Identity principal to authenticate is automatically granted admin access
Subsequent logins do not receive admin privileges
Admin status persists across sessions
Admin can access /admin dashboard after first login

requirements.text: Update Privacy Policy to remove all sections related to customer Internet Identity authentication and user account data storage, keeping only admin authentication and guest checkout information

quotes: Yes, specifically the privacy section part talking about internet Identity but if it effects more legal, update whatever is needed to be changed

acceptanceCriteria: Privacy Policy no longer mentions customer Internet Identity authentication
Privacy Policy no longer references user account data storage for customers
Privacy Policy accurately reflects guest-only checkout model
Admin authentication information remains if relevant

requirements.text: Update Terms of Service to remove all account-related sections for customers, including account creation, profile management, and any references to customer login requirements

quotes: if it effects more legal, update whatever is needed to be changed

acceptanceCriteria: Terms of Service no longer references customer account creation or management
Terms of Service reflects guest-only checkout model
Final sale policy and age requirements remain intact

requirements.text: Add admin dashboard fields for customizable homepage hero section: create input fields for hero image upload (with preview), editable headline text (currently 'STREETWEAR REDEFINED'), and editable tagline text (currently 'Exclusive drops. Limited editions. Unmatched style.'), with backend storage and frontend rendering

quotes: I would like to change the image whenever I want in the admin page

You want 'STREETWEAR REDEFINED' and the tagline 'Exclusive drops. Limited editions. Unmatched style.' to be editable fields in the admin dashboard alongside the hero image we discussed earlier, correct?

acceptanceCriteria: Admin dashboard includes image upload field for homepage hero background
Admin dashboard includes text input for hero headline
Admin dashboard includes text input for hero tagline
Changes save to backend and persist across sessions
Homepage renders the custom hero image, headline, and tagline
Image upload shows preview before saving

requirements.text: Add admin dashboard fields for editable social media URLs: create input fields for YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, Twitch, and Kick URLs with backend storage, and update the footer to render links using these admin-configured URLs

quotes: Just want to edit the URLs so we can put the specific ones that take users to our channels

acceptanceCriteria: Admin dashboard includes URL input fields for YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, Twitch, and Kick
URLs save to backend and persist across sessions
Footer social media links use the admin-configured URLs
Empty URL fields hide corresponding social icons in footer

requirements.text: Remove the hover dropdown functionality from the Shop navigation link in the Header component, making it a simple direct link to the shop page without any dropdown or category list

quotes: Also the on the nav bar I no longer want it to open that horizontal box when hovering over the shop, We can completely delete that idea

acceptanceCriteria: Shop link in header navigation is a simple direct link with no hover behavior
ShopDropdown component is removed or no longer rendered in header
Clicking Shop link navigates directly to /shop page
No dropdown or category list appears on hover

requirements.text: Redesign the shop page category filter from dropdown to horizontal pill-style buttons: replace the 'Filter by category' dropdown with a horizontal row of pill-shaped category buttons styled with the electric blue accent color, dark backgrounds, and smooth transitions that match the streetwear aesthetic

quotes: When I view the shop you have it setup like this: 'Filter by category:' with a drop down box, i think its pretty ugly, what can we do to make it seamless and visually pleasing?

acceptanceCriteria: Shop page displays horizontal pill-style category buttons instead of dropdown
Pills use electric blue accent color for active/selected state
Pills have dark backgrounds with smooth hover transitions
Category filter functionality remains the same (filtering products by category)
Design is mobile-responsive with horizontal scrolling if needed
Visual style matches the streetwear aesthetic with floating depth effects

constraints: Maintain single-actor backend architecture in backend/main.mo

Do not modify immutable frontend paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui/*
Preserve existing Stripe payment integration for guest checkout
Keep all existing product catalog features including categories, sizes, colors, and drag-and-drop ordering
Maintain dynamic shipping calculator logic with existing regional pricing
Preserve admin dashboard functionality for products, categories, orders, analytics, and contact forms
Keep newsletter signup form and storage in footer
Maintain manual Printify fulfillment workflow with ORDER-XXXX format
nonGoals: Implementing automated newsletter sending (requires external email service)
Integrating Printify API for automatic order fulfillment
Creating user accounts or login for regular customers
Adding order tracking for customers (no user accounts = no order history access)
Implementing real-time inventory sync with Printify
Adding customer profile features or saved shipping addresses for non-admin users
